001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.base.ComponentType;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebDriver;
005import java.util.function.Consumer;
006import org.openqa.selenium.By;
007
008/**
009 * Represents a base interface for UI elements in the framework.
010 *
011 * <p>This interface defines common behavior for all UI elements, including
012 * locating elements, identifying component types, and executing actions
013 * before and after interaction. It serves as the foundation for all UI
014 * element interfaces (e.g., buttons, checkboxes, inputs, etc.).
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@SuppressWarnings("java:S1452")
019public interface UiElement {
020
021   /**
022    * Retrieves the locator used to identify this UI element on the web page.
023    *
024    * @return The {@link By} locator associated with this UI element.
025    */
026   By locator();
027
028   /**
029    * Retrieves the component type of this UI element.
030    *
031    * <p>The specific component type is determined by the implementing class.
032    *
033    * @param <T> The type of the component.
034    * @return The component type associated with this UI element.
035    */
036   <T extends ComponentType> T componentType();
037
038   /**
039    * Retrieves the enum representation of this UI element.
040    *
041    * <p>This method is primarily useful for elements that are implemented as enums.
042    *
043    * @return The enum instance representing this UI element.
044    */
045   Enum<?> enumImpl();
046
047   /**
048    * Provides a hook for actions to be executed before interacting with this UI element.
049    *
050    * <p>By default, this method does nothing, but implementing classes can override it
051    * to perform actions such as waiting for visibility, logging, or additional validations.
052    *
053    * @return A {@link Consumer} that takes a {@link SmartWebDriver} and executes actions before interaction.
054    */
055   default Consumer<SmartWebDriver> before() {
056      return smartWebDriver -> {
057      };
058   }
059
060   /**
061    * Provides a hook for actions to be executed after interacting with this UI element.
062    *
063    * <p>By default, this method does nothing, but implementing classes can override it to perform actions such as
064    * logging, waiting for an expected state, or triggering additional validations.
065    *
066    * @return A {@link Consumer} that takes a {@link SmartWebDriver} and executes actions after interaction.
067    */
068   default Consumer<SmartWebDriver> after() {
069      return smartWebDriver -> {
070      };
071   }
072
073}
